chess.algorithms
Class AlfaBeta

java.lang.Object
  chess.algorithms.MoveAlgorithm
      chess.algorithms.AlfaBeta
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
public class AlfaBeta
extends MoveAlgorithm
implements java.io.Serializable

AlfaBeta, a subclass of MoveAlgorithm, is an alfabeta search algorithm. This technique is called "alfa-beta pruning". It is a refined minimax strategy that identifies unfavorable branches in the move tree and removes them early, thus speeding up the search process.

Author:
Arvydas Bancewicz
See Also:
Serialized Form
